RenderUI.string: This package cannot be installed into $ModsFolder$ folder because $ModsFolder$ does not supported by current game ($RageGAME$).
This package cannot be installed into $ModsFolder$ folder because $ModsFolder$ does not supported by package format.
This package cannot be installed into $ModsFolder$ folder because it does not affect any RPF archives.
This package cannot be installed into $ModsFolder$ folder because $ModsFolderAsi$ is not installed.
Install this mod directly into the game folder
This package cannot be installed into the game folder because it is disabled in $ModsFolder$ folder settings.
Please review the information below and confirm installation.
Run game and check what you just got
Something happened. Please check log file for error details.
A fatal error occurred during installation. Please check log file for error details.
MSXML is not installed. It is required to use Package Installer.
Package Installer is unable to create log file. Restart your PC and try again. If issue still persist check your antivirus software.
Please check log file for error details.
Package file is not valid ZIP file.
The compression method of this ZIP file is not supported.
Unknown file extension. Package file must be .oiv or .zip.
Cannot access package file. Make sure it is not used by another process.
Unable to find "assembly.xml" file in this package. Probable file is not $AppName$ Package or file corrupted.
Unable to read "assembly.xml", probable file is corrupted.
Unknown format of "assembly.xml", probable file is corrupted.
This package can’t be installed with your version of $AppName$.
The "metadata" tag is missed in "assembly.xml", probable file is corrupted.
The metadata information is missed or corrupted in "assembly.xml".
The "assembly.xml" have invalid XML format or corrupted.
Unable to read package Id from "assembly.xml".
The "colors" tag is missed in "assembly.xml", probable file is corrupted.
The colors information is missed or corrupted in "assembly.xml".
The content information is missed or corrupted in "assembly.xml".
The "content" tag is missed in "assembly.xml", probable file is corrupted.
Unable to find "content" folder in this package. Probable file is not $AppName$ Package or file corrupted.
This package cannot be installed into $RageGAME$. Please check supported games list in additional information section.
Some files are missing in the package archive. Please contact package author.
Some files have incorrect ingame path. Please contact package author.
Another package installation is currently in progress. Please wait for it to finish before trying again.
This package cannot be uninstalled automatically.
